events.name: EV Battery Supply Chain
events.wd_description: The process of supplying and utilizing electric vehicle batteries, including their production, use, and recycling.

events.name: Lithium Mining
events.wd_description: The process of extracting lithium from ore deposits.
events.description: The process of extracting lithium from ore deposits.

events.name: Lithium Refining
events.wd_description: The process of refining extracted lithium to produce high-purity lithium compounds.
events.description: The process of refining extracted lithium to produce high-purity lithium compounds.

events.name: Lithium-ion Battery Production
events.wd_description: The process of manufacturing electric vehicle batteries using lithium and other materials.
events.description: The process of manufacturing electric vehicle batteries using lithium and other materials.

events.name: Electric Vehicle Sales
events.wd_description: The process of selling electric vehicles equipped with lithium-ion batteries.
events.description: The process of selling electric vehicles equipped with lithium-ion batteries.

events.name: Battery Recycling
events.wd_description: The process of recycling used lithium-ion batteries to recover valuable materials and reduce waste.
events.description: The process of recycling used lithium-ion batteries to recover valuable materials and reduce waste.

events.name: Disassembly
events.wd_description: The process of disassembling used lithium-ion batteries to isolate components.
events.description: The process of disassembling used lithium-ion batteries to isolate components.

events.name: Material Recovery
events.wd_description: The process of recovering valuable materials from disassembled batteries.

events.name: Closed-Loop Production
events.wd_description: The process of manufacturing new lithium-ion batteries using recovered materials.
